title: Expert-Designed Workshop for Online Mathematics Learning Quality Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Development of an online learning quality assessment system using mixed research methods (sequential approach), analyzing real educational environments through VR simulations.

learning_goals: Participants can identify evaluation criteria for eight quality dimensions (leadership management, learner profiles, learning support, assessment systems, infrastructure, etc.) of online math learning courses with 85% accuracy
Participants can analyze learning design flaws in VR simulation environments and propose at least three improvement strategies
Participants can collect and analyze learning quality data using mixed research methods (surveys + focus groups) and write result reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
